What's the main reason why Verus is not activating Sapling, and instead choosing to stick with its current blockchain design?

Actually, Verus is activating Sapling, making it one of the few projects to do so, alongside Zcash. This upgrade is a significant milestone for the Verus community and demonstrates the project's commitment to innovation and technical advancements.

50 Stake/Mine +dPoW blockchain design, to the only project besides Zcash to be activating Sapling…and now a simultaneous release of the most advanced and truly “Something at Stake” PoS solution with no weak subjectivity.
I’m excited and proud to be involved with this community project and am busting at the seams with excitement over this incredible impending upgrade.
As technically sound and logically constructed as these innovations within Verus blockchain are, there’s also the irresistible feeling of magic about it all. Especially when you see the talent of these developers demonstrated in solving the most pressing problems in Proof of Stake previously thought inherent.
